    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Blur
    A pixel processor that apply blur effect to an image.
    Controller
     
    FileIO
     
    GrayScale
    A pixel processor that converts a color image to grayscale.
    HistogramGenerator
    Generate values that are needed to draw the histogram.
    HistogramView
    A customized JavaFX component, extending VBox, displaying a histogram over frequencies per intensities.
    ImageModel
    A facade class for all image processing operations.
    ImagePixelsConverter
    Conversion from JavaFX Image object to an int[][] ARGB pixel matrix, and vice versa.
    InvertColors
    A pixel processor that inverts the colors of an image.
    IPixelProcessor
    This interface represents a generic pixel processor that applies pixel transformation for an image pixel matrix.
    MainApplication
     
    PixelConverter
    Static methods for conversions between an int representing ARGB-values and the separate parts alpha, red, green and blue.
    RotateImage
    A pixel processor that rotates an image 180 degree.
    Sharpening
    A pixel processor that sharpens a grayscale image.
    View
     
    WindowLevel
    A pixel processor that adjusts the contrast of a grayscale image.
